dmca.title: Copyright Violation: brentcross-uk.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Fraud Warning [mailto:fraudwarning419@yahoo.co.uk] 
Sent: Thursday, September 16, 2004 9:18 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: abuse@verisign.com
Subject: Copyright Violation: brentcross-uk.com

Hi,
The following web site is a fank bank and is illegally
using Verisign's seal logo:

http://www.brentcross-uk.com/calllog.asp

Please remove this site for violation of your AUP.

A large number of fraudulent sites have been moving to
theplanet.com as word spreads that they don't take
illegal sites down. We are having difficulty tracking
down the owners of the IP addresses because your
rwhois server is down.

ReferralServer: rwhois://rwhois.theplanet.com:4321

Please can you look into this problem as well.

Regards,
Fraud Warning 419
